Class TransactionMgr

  • java.lang.Object
    • TransactionMgr

  • public class TransactionMgr
extends java.lang.Object
    GUI class that handles all requests from the user note: all the managers are static to prevent duplication, and final to prevent mutation of references
    Author:
    Pang Kang Wei,Joshua A0087809M, JP

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      TransactionMgr(Finances finances)
      Default Constructor

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean addTransaction()
      Records a new transaction by displaying a pop-up that receives user input Stores the new transaction information in the EntryMgr, HistoryMgr, and 2 out of the 4 CatMgrs
      static boolean clearLog()
      Clears the history log
      boolean deleteTransaction()
      Deletes an existing transaction by displaying a pop-up that receives user input Updates the new transaction information in the EntryMgr, HistoryMgr, and 2 out of the 4 CatMgrs
      boolean editTransaction()
      Edits an existing transaction by displaying a pop-up that receives user input Updates the new transaction information in the EntryMgr, HistoryMgr, and 2 out of the 4 CatMgrs
      static org.jfree.data.category.DefaultCategoryDataset getAssetChartData()
      Gets the assetCatMgr's chart data

      Gets the balance

      Gets the liabilityCatMgr's chart data

      Gets transaction list from entryMgr
      boolean renameAssetCategories()
      Creates a pop up that allows user to edit asset categories Updates the new transaction information in the EntryMgr, HistoryMgr, and AssetCatMgr
      boolean renameExpenseCategories()
      Creates a pop up that allows user to edit expense categories Updates the new transaction information in the EntryMgr, HistoryMgr, and ExpenseCatMgr
      boolean renameIncomeCategories()
      Creates a pop up that allows user to edit income categories Updates the new transaction information in the EntryMgr, HistoryMgr, and IncomeCatMgr
      boolean renameLiabilityCategories()
      Creates a pop up that allows user to edit liability categories Updates the new transaction information in the EntryMgr, HistoryMgr, and LiabilityCatMgr
      boolean transferIntraAsset()
      Performs an intra-asset transfer Updates the new transaction information in the EntryMgr, HistoryMgr, and AssetCatMgr
      boolean transferIntraLiability()
      Performs an intra-liability transfer Updates the new transaction information in the EntryMgr, HistoryMgr, and AssetCatMgr
      boolean undo()
      Undoes the last transaction.
